title.narrative: Providing Health Services to 300 displaced Syrian and vulnerable Lebanese Children at Risk in North Lebanon (particularly Batroun, Chekka, Qobbeh, Beb El Tabbaneh and Jabal Mohsen) and the Southern Suburbs of Beirut (particularly Baabda, Aley, Beirut, El Meten, El Chouf and Keserwan) as well as to 550 displaced Syrian and vulnerable Lebanese Persons with Mental illness in the same areas in North Lebanon, Beirut, and Mount Lebanon (particularly Jbeil, Keserwan, El Meten, Baabda, Aley, El Chouf).

description.narrative: Providing Health Services to 300 displaced Syrian and vulnerable Lebanese Children at Risk in North Lebanon (particularly Batroun, Chekka, Qobbeh, Beb El Tabbaneh and Jabal Mohsen) and the Southern Suburbs of Beirut (particularly Baabda, Aley, Beirut, El Meten, El Chouf and Keserwan) as well as to 550 displaced Syrian and vulnerable Lebanese Persons with Mental illness in the same areas in North Lebanon, Beirut, and Mount Lebanon (particularly Jbeil, Keserwan, El Meten, Baabda, Aley, El Chouf).

participating-org.narrative: Restart Center for Rehabilitation of victims of violence and Torture

receiver-org.narrative: Restart Center for Rehabilitation of victims of violence and Torture
